Package View

Class ScrapingPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • View.ScrapingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ILanguageStateObserver
    public class ScrapingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILanguageStateObserver
    The panel used to scrape the news portals for popular topics and store the retrieved data in the database.
    Author:
    Sime
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
